author: Jessica Clifford
title: Call for Airbnb shutdown over 'isolation holiday' promotions
description: Ignoring travel bans, accommodation websites are offering isolation lockdown packages, including stocked fridges and food deliveries so guests can lock themselves in for their stay.
content:
Updated 
April 01, 2020 18:12:19
A rash of self-isolation holiday promotions had led to calls for a shutdown of Airbnb and other accommodation booking sites to bolster coronavirus travel bans for the Easter holidays.
Key points:
